traits.name: Charge
entries: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

actions.name: Pike
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
